author: jainshilpi
body:
This PR is just taking care of the comments here in #33817 
and modifies the electron structures necessary for low pT electron analyses. 
The planned change was just to have "dropClassifications = cms.string("0")" as intended in #33817  
However, it seems that dropIsolation and dropShapes could be useful for other low pT electron analyes. 
Checked on 136.88811 WF and it increases the size by ~0.02% 

@bainbrid
title: Adding necessary electron structures for low pT part of slimmedElectron collection
